articles.author: Jordan Hayne, Markus Mannheim
articles.title: How border restrictions smashed interstate flights during the coronavirus pandemic - ABC News
articles.description: For at least two months this year, the most travelled flight route in Australia was between Brisbane and Cairns, unseating one of the busiest flight paths in the world.
articles.content:
It was one of the busiest and most lucrative routes on the planet.
Up until earlier this year, the 90-minute air journey between Melbourne and Sydney was travelled more than any other in the Western… [+4995 chars]
